attributes.action: Give EU nationals physical proof of UK status
attributes.additional_details: The Government should issues this physical proof to every person from EU who has fully settled status.
attributes.background: The Government should give EU nationals physical proof of their UK status, because digital proof is sometimes insufficient and can be too complicated to show people who require it.
